ModMetaData.name: Mad Skills
ModMetaData.author: Ratys
ModMetaData.description:
A collection of tweaks (found in Options -> Mod Settings -> Mad Skills) to change or turn off skill degradation and learning saturation.
Does not require a new colony to add, tune, or remove.
Preview image by Shinzy.
Available languages: - Chinese (simplified) (by duduluu; slightly outdated) - Chinese (traditional) (by duduluu; slightly outdated) - English - Japanese (by Proxyer; slightly outdated) - Russian - Spanish (Castilian) (by 53N4; slightly outdated) - Spanish (Latin America) (by 53N4; slightly outdated)
Refer to forum thread for additional information.
